name: The Belcher's Quotes Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: "I hope our new dad is blonde." For which episode did Gene Belcher make this statement?
questions.explanation:
Art Crawl.

	When Bob puts a picture of an animal anus on the wall of his hamburger restaurant against an elderly couple's protests, Gene wants to know if his dad is going to jail. Tina says if he goes to jail she'll wave to him every day, Louise wants him to keep quiet about what he was doing that got him thrown in jail, and Gene comes back with what kind of stepdad he wants. "Art Crawl" is the eighth episode of season one of "Bob's Burgers" that aired on March 20, 2011 in the United States.

questions.text: "Let's release the lobster from whence it came! The supermarket!" In which episode did Gene Belcher make this declaration?
questions.explanation:
Lobsterfest.

	After Lobsterfest is cancelled due to a hurricane, the Belcher kids find a lobster and decide to eat it in retaliation for their dad and Lobsterfest being cancelled. Louise tries to boil it when Tina and Gene stop her because the brother and sister realize they want their first time eating lobster to be special.Gene makes the above mentioned quote seconds before Louise accidentally drops the lobster into the boiling water. Since it's already dead, the kids decide to eat their first lobster. "Lobsterfest" was the twelfth episode of season one of "Bob's Burgers" and aired in the United States on May 15, 2011.

questions.text: "You don't want to mess with my sister. She'll wear down your self-esteem over a period of years." Which Belcher gave this piece of advice?
questions.explanation:
Tina.

	This quote was Tina's advice to Logan in "Ear-sy Rider" after he stole the bunny ears that Louise wears every day. "Ear-sy Rider" was the first episode of season three that aired on September 30, 2012 in the United States.

questions.text:
While searching for their kids, whose diary did Linda Belcher find and read this line from to help find them?

"If boys had uteruses they'd be called duderuses"
questions.explanation:
Tina.

	Tina sneaked out with the other kids to go down to the taffy pull factory to play inside. While searching for them, Linda found Tina's diary which ratted all of them out. Linda also read a line that Tina had written that Bob thought was really funny. "The Belchies" was the first episode of season two of "Bob's Burgers" that aired in the United States on March 11, 2012.

questions.text: In what episode did Gene Belcher proclaim loudly, "Yay, scrotal wax!"
questions.explanation:
Mother Daughter Laser Razor.

	Tina wants to get her legs waxed at a professional waxing salon, but is afraid to do it so Bob agrees to get his waxed with her. Gene is with them and yells out the above quote which prompts Bob very quickly to  admit he's only getting his legs done. "Mother Daughter Laser Razor" was the tenth episode of season three of "Bob's Burgers" and aired on January 6, 2013 in the United States.

questions.text: Where was Gene Belcher referring to when he said, "I wish I'd stayed in there"?
questions.explanation:
Linda's womb.

	Bob was practicing what he was going to say to the bank people about what his loan meant when it was past due. Linda mentioned that Gene was past due and Gene reacted by wishing he could go back into Linda's womb. "Bob Day Afternoon" was the second episode of season two of "Bob's Burgers" which aired on March 18, 2012 in the United States.

questions.text: "Listen, this town gave us the best candy we've ever seen. We owe it to them to go back." What holiday were the Belcher kids celebrating that made Tina Belcher say this quote?
questions.explanation:
Halloween.

	The Belcher kids were spending Halloween at King's Head Island where families are richer and candy is better. After trick or treating is officially over the teenagers on the island come out and begin causing mischief that they call hell hunt. When the kids the Belcher's are with on Halloween are captured by the teenagers, Tina suggests they go back and help the kids because those kids helped the Belcher's have a great Halloween. "Full Bars" is the second episode of season three of "Bob's Burgers" that aired on October 7, 2012.

questions.text: For what episode did Tina Belcher admit, "I'm no hero. I put on my bra one boob at a time"?
questions.explanation:
Boyz 4 Now.

	Louise and Tina hitch a ride with their friend Zeke to see a Boyz 4 Now concert. While at the concert, Louise develops her first crush on one of the members, Boo Boo. Tina makes this statement to Louise while they're in the car going to the concert. "Boyz 4 Now" is the twenty-first episode of the third season of "Bob's Burgers" that aired on April 28, 2013 in the United States.

questions.text:
"Are we just going to ignore the fact that ______ just pooped in the pool?" 

Who did Bob Belcher say pooped in the pool?
questions.explanation:
Louise.

	The Belcher kids try to get out of gym class by starting a synchronized swimming class which they have no desire to attend. When Linda finds out, she starts coaching the class so the kids won't be left unsupervised for a class period. When Louise realizes she's actually going to have to work, she does everything she can to get out of it, including pooping in the pool. "Synchronized Swimming" was the third episode of season two of "Bob's Burgers" airing on March 25, 2012 in the United States.

questions.text: Who told Gene Belcher to, "Go put on underwear"?
questions.explanation:
Bob.

	Linda and Bob took their kids with them while they were at a wine tasting on the train. Gene dressed up in overalls for the trip and when Bob told him to change, Gene admitted he wasn't wearing underwear so Bob made him put on underwear along with his other clothes. "The Kids Rob a Train" is the fifteenth episode of season four of "Bob's Burgers" which aired on March 30, 2014 in the United States.
